mapper.insert: insert into campus_cart(c_cartnumber, u_userid, p_number, c_count, c_option) values(campus_cart_seq.nextval, #{u_userid} , #{p_number} ,#{c_count}, #{c_option})
mapper.select: select count(*) from campus_cart where u_userid=#{u_userid} and p_number=#{p_number}

select p.p_number, u.u_userid, c.c_cartnumber, u.u_username, c.c_option, p.p_name,p.p_manufact, c.c_count, p.p_price, a.a_uuid, a.a_path, a.a_name from campus_cart c, campus_user u , campus_product p, simple_attach a where u.u_userid = c.u_userid and p.p_number = c.p_number and p.p_number=a.p_number and c.u_userid=#{u_userid} order by c_cartnumber desc

select p.p_number, u.u_userid, c.c_cartnumber, u.u_username, p.p_name, c.c_count, p.p_price, p.p_shippingfee, c.c_option from campus_cart c, campus_user u , campus_product p where u.u_userid = c.u_userid and p.p_number = c.p_number and c.u_userid=#{u_userid} order by c_cartnumber desc

select p.p_number, u.u_userid, c.c_cartnumber, u.u_username, c.c_option, p.p_name, c.c_count, p.p_price, p.p_shippingfee from campus_cart c, campus_user u , campus_product p where u.u_userid = c.u_userid and p.p_number = c.p_number and c.u_userid=#{u_userid} and c.c_cartnumber = #{c_cartnumber} order by c_cartnumber desc
